meta.title: Update Variants (Batch) - Variants - Catalog - Store Management - API Reference
meta.description:
Creates or updates a batch of Variant objects. At the time of writing, the current limit is 50 variants. This limit is subject to change.

Authorization...

blocks.data: Creates or updates a batch of `Variant` objects. At the time of writing, the current limit is `50` variants. This limit is subject to change.

### OAuth Scopes
|  **UI Name** | **Permission** | **Parameter** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  Products | modify | `store_v2_products` |
|  Products | read-only | `store_v2_products_read_only` |

### Headers

|Header|Parameter|Description|
|-|-|-|
|`X-Auth-Client`|`client_id`|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|
|`X-Auth-Token`|`access_token `|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|

### Example

```http
GET /stores/{$$.env.store_hash}/v3/catalog/summary
host: api.bigcommerce.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Client: {client_id}
X-Auth-Token: {access_token}
```

* For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see: [Authentication](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication). 
* **Name**: X-Auth-Client
* **Location**: header

### OAuth Scopes
|  **UI Name** | **Permission** | **Parameter** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  Products | modify | `store_v2_products` |
|  Products | read-only | `store_v2_products_read_only` |

### Headers

|Header|Parameter|Description|
|-|-|-|
|`X-Auth-Client`|`client_id`|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|
|`X-Auth-Token`|`access_token `|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|

### Example

```http
GET /stores/{$$.env.store_hash}/v3/catalog/summary
host: api.bigcommerce.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Client: {client_id}
X-Auth-Token: {access_token}
```

* For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see: [Authentication](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication). 
* **Name**: X-Auth-Token
* **Location**: header

items.description: The model for a PUT to update variants on a product.

cost_price.description: The cost price of the variant. Not affected by Price List prices.

price.description: This variant's base price on the storefront. If a Price List ID is used, the Price List value will be used. If a Price List ID is not used, and this value is `null`, the product's default price (set in the Product resource's `price` field) will be used as the base price.

sale_price.description: This variant's sale price on the storefront. If a Price List ID is used, the Price List value will be used. If a Price List ID is not used, and this value is null, the product's sale price (set in the Product resource's `price` field) will be used as the sale price.

retail_price.description: This variant's retail price on the storefront. If a Price List ID is used, the Price List value will be used. If a Price List ID is not used, and this value is null, the product's retail price (set in the Product resource's `price` field) will be used as the retail price.

weight.description: This variant's base weight on the storefront. If this value is null, the product's default weight (set in the Product resource's weight field) will be used as the base weight.

width.description: Width of the variant, which can be used when calculating shipping costs. If this value is `null`, the product's default width (set in the Product resource's `width` field) will be used as the base width.

height.description: Height of the variant, which can be used when calculating shipping costs. If this value is `null`, the product's default height (set in the Product resource's `height` field) will be used as the base height.

depth.description: Depth of the variant, which can be used when calculating shipping costs. If this value is `null`, the product's default depth (set in the Product resource's `depth` field) will be used as the base depth.

is_free_shipping.description: Flag used to indicate whether the variant has free shipping. If `true`, the shipping cost for the variant will be zero.

fixed_cost_shipping_price.description: A fixed shipping cost for the variant. If defined, this value will be used during checkout instead of normal shipping-cost calculation.

purchasing_disabled.description: If `true`, this variant will not be purchasable on the storefront.

purchasing_disabled_message.description: If `purchasing_disabled` is `true`, this message should show on the storefront when the variant is selected.

upc.description: The UPC code used in feeds for shopping comparison sites and external channel integrations.

inventory_level.description: Inventory level for the variant, which is used when the product's inventory_tracking is set to `variant`.

inventory_warning_level.description: When the variant hits this inventory level, it is considered low stock.

bin_picking_number.description: Identifies where in a warehouse the variant is located.

items.title: Variant Put

cost_price.description: The cost price of the variant. Not affected by Price List prices.

price.description: This variant's base price on the storefront. If a Price List ID is used, the Price List value will be used. If a Price List ID is not used, and this value is `null`, the product's default price (set in the Product resource's `price` field) will be used as the base price.

sale_price.description: This variant's sale price on the storefront. If a Price List ID is used, the Price List value will be used. If a Price List ID is not used, and this value is null, the product's sale price (set in the Product resource's `price` field) will be used as the sale price.

retail_price.description: This variant's retail price on the storefront. If a Price List ID is used, the Price List value will be used. If a Price List ID is not used, and this value is null, the product's retail price (set in the Product resource's `price` field) will be used as the retail price.

weight.description: This variant's base weight on the storefront. If this value is null, the product's default weight (set in the Product resource's weight field) will be used as the base weight.

width.description: Width of the variant, which can be used when calculating shipping costs. If this value is `null`, the product's default width (set in the Product resource's `width` field) will be used as the base width.

height.description: Height of the variant, which can be used when calculating shipping costs. If this value is `null`, the product's default height (set in the Product resource's `height` field) will be used as the base height.

depth.description: Depth of the variant, which can be used when calculating shipping costs. If this value is `null`, the product's default depth (set in the Product resource's `depth` field) will be used as the base depth.

is_free_shipping.description: Flag used to indicate whether the variant has free shipping. If `true`, the shipping cost for the variant will be zero.

fixed_cost_shipping_price.description: A fixed shipping cost for the variant. If defined, this value will be used during checkout instead of normal shipping-cost calculation.

purchasing_disabled.description: If `true`, this variant will not be purchasable on the storefront.

purchasing_disabled_message.description: If `purchasing_disabled` is `true`, this message should show on the storefront when the variant is selected.

upc.description: The UPC code used in feeds for shopping comparison sites and external channel integrations.

inventory_level.description: Inventory level for the variant, which is used when the product's inventory_tracking is set to `variant`.

inventory_warning_level.description: When the variant hits this inventory level, it is considered low stock.

bin_picking_number.description: Identifies where in a warehouse the variant is located.

sku_id.description: Read-only reference to v2 API's SKU ID. Null if it is a base variant.

label.description: The label of the option value.

option_values.description: Array of option and option values IDs that make up this variant. Will be empty if the variant is the product's base variant.

calculated_price.description: The price of the variant as seen on the storefront. This price takes into account `sale_price` and any price adjustment rules that are applicable to this variant.

meta.description: Data about the response, including pagination and collection totals.

pagination.description: Data about the response, including pagination and collection totals.
pagination.title: Pagination

total.description: Total number of items in the result set.

count.description: Total number of items in the collection response.

per_page.description: The amount of items returned in the collection per page, controlled by the limit parameter.

current_page.description: The page you are currently on within the collection.

total_pages.description: The total number of pages in the collection.

links.description: Pagination links for the previous and next parts of the whole collection.

previous.description: Link to the previous page returned in the response.

current.description: Link to the current page returned in the response.

next.description: Link to the next page returned in the response.

meta.title: Collection Meta

blocks.data: This is the result of missing required fields, or of invalid data. See the response for more details.

data.description: Errors during batch usage for the BigCommerce API.

allOf.description: Error payload for the BigCommerce API.

title.description: The error title describing the particular error.

allOf.title: Base Error

data.title: Variants Batch Error Response
